 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.lqk.framework.verification
接口 Validator.ValidationListener

包容类：
Validator
public static interface Validator.ValidationListener

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when validate() is called.

方法摘要
 void onValidationFailed(android.view.View failedView, Rule<?> failedRule)
          Called if any of the Rules fail.
 void onValidationSucceeded()
          Called when all the Rules added to this Validator are valid.
 

方法详细信息

onValidationSucceeded

void onValidationSucceeded()
Called when all the Rules added to this Validator are valid.

onValidationFailed

void onValidationFailed(android.view.View failedView,
                        Rule<?> failedRule)
Called if any of the Rules fail.

参数：
failedView - The View that did not pass validation.
failedRule - The failed Rule associated with the View.
